actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the Encampment River, Colorado, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers system.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Encampment River in Colorado as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the Encampment River, Colorado, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers system.
